Interface TagDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TagService

    public interface TagDAO

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteTag(int id)
      Delete a tag with a specific id from the database.
      java.util.List<Tag> findAllTags()
      Retrieves all the Tag models in the database.
      Tag findTagById(int id)
      Retrieve a Tag Model with a specific ID from the database.
      void saveTag(Tag tag)
      Saves a Tag model to the database
      void updateTag(Tag tag)
      Updates a Tag model in the database, if the model isn't in the database, it saves the model to the database.

    • Method Detail

      • saveTag

        void saveTag(Tag tag)
        Saves a Tag model to the database
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag model to be saved

      • updateTag

        void updateTag(Tag tag)
        Updates a Tag model in the database, if the model isn't in the database, it saves the model to the database.
        Parameters:
        tag - Tag model to update or save in the database.

      • findAllTags

        java.util.List<Tag> findAllTags()
        Retrieves all the Tag models in the database.
        Returns:
        List of all the tag models in the database.

      • findTagById

        Tag findTagById(int id)
        Retrieve a Tag Model with a specific ID from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - ID of the Tag to be retrieved.
        Returns:
        Returns Tag model with the provided id.

      • deleteTag

        void deleteTag(int id)
        Delete a tag with a specific id from the database.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the tag to be deleted.
